title: Cycling Plus October issue on sale now! Subscribe and receive a free Lezyne Smart Grip Mount worth £25!
content:
In the October edition of Cycling Plus the team shines a light on the much-overlooked endurance bike with four of the finest going head to head. There are first rides of the Vitus ZX-1 EVO 105 aero bike and Benno Bikes’ RemiDemi 9D ‘etility’ (electric utility) bike.

Cycling Plus looks at how a pro-cycling diet could help, or even harm, your cycling potential; read all about Mark Cavendish’s extraordinary comeback, and the team heads out for an adventure in the Gower Peninsula.

Subscribe to Cycling Plus to receive your free gift as well as discounts and more

In it for the long haul

The endurance bike may not be the ‘rock star’ of mean machines but it could be the best bike solution for most of us. Simon Withers finds out why…

All hail…

Cycling Plus speaks to those closest to Mark Cavendish to find out how he pulled off one of the best comebacks in cycling history.

Feeling all Wight

With pristine roads, little traffic and easy navigation, could the Isle of Wight be the UK’s number one cycling destination? The Cycling Plus team tests it out.

Pimp my ride

If finding a new bike is proving troublesome, worry not, senior tech editor, Warren Rossiter, shares the 10 best ways to improve on what you’ve got.
